It acknowledges that historically, Boston College has had a better reputation and a more traditional campus experience. The commenter goes on to say that the two schools are probably close enough in reputation that he/she would suggest deciding based on fit, which does not necessarily indicate a preference for one over the other. Therefore, it appears that there is no strict preference expressed in this comment.
